document.full_text: a russian court sentenced six men involved in a rare case of european piracy to 7 to 12 years in prison on thursday for their roles in the hijacking of a cargo ship off the coast of sweden in july 2009.
document.title: europe: russia: ship's hijackers are convicted of piracy
lines_and_colors: a russian court sentenced six men involved in a rare case of european piracy to 7 to 12 years in prison on thursday for their roles in the hijacking of a cargo ship off the coast of sweden in july 2009.
